original_title: Técnicas de duelo: Una cuestión de honor
overview: The teacher and the butcher of a small town in the tropical Andes, are both in love with the same woman (Miriam). They decide to duel for her. Everyone in town catch the notice, except of course for Miriam. The Mayor then decides to manipulate the event to make it political.

production_companies.name: Compañía para el Fomento Cinematográfico - FOCINE

title: A Matter of Honour
